dex.name: Uniswap
dex.description: Swap, earn, and build on the leading decentralized crypto trading protocol.

dex.name: SyncSwap
dex.description: SyncSwap brings more people easy-to-use and low-cost DeFi with complete Ethereum security powered by zero-knowledge technology.

dex.name: Maverick
dex.description: Maverick Protocol offers a new infrastructure for decentralized finance, built to facilitate the most liquid markets for traders, liquidity providers, DAO treasuries, and developers, powered by a revolutionary Automated Market Maker (AMM).

dex.name: Koi
dex.description: KOI is a DeFi platform, serving as a liquidity hub for all projects on zkSync. KOI's dynamic dApp features both a concentrated and standard pool AMM DEX, complete with limit orders, a farming platform, and a bond platform.

dex.name: PancakeSwap
dex.description: Trade, earn, and own crypto on the all-in-one multichain DEX.

dex.name: Zyfi
dex.description: Zyfi is a DeFi portal to gasless transactions on zkSync, allowing users to pay with any ERC-20 token as gas or enjoy sponsored swaps. It is powered by Zyfi's paymaster API.

dex.name: 1inch
dex.description: Optimize your trades across hundreds of DEXes on multiple networks.

lending.name: ZeroLend
lending.description: The most efficient lending market for liquid restaking tokens (LRTs). Borrow Ethereum against $weETH, $pufETH, $ezETH and others.

lending.name: Aave
lending.description: Aave is the worldâ€™s largest liquidity protocol. Supply, borrow, swap, stake and more.

lending.name: Venus
lending.description: Simple and powerful community-driven finance for the entire globe.

lending.name: Kelp
lending.description: rsETH is a Liquid Restaked Token (LRT) issued by Kelp DAO designed to offer liquidity to illiquid assets deposited into restaking platforms, such as EigenLayer.

bridges.name: txSync
bridges.description: Native bridge and user friendly interface to view and interact with your assets on zkSync and zkSync Lite.

bridges.name: Across
bridges.description: Across is a cross-chain bridge that allows users to bridge assets between ZKsync and other chains.

nfts.name: zkMarkets
nfts.description: zkMarkets is your gateway to the exhilarating world of NFTs. It is built on the robust zkSync blockchain and offers a seamless experience for buying, selling, creating, and exploring unique digital assets.

tools.name: RevokeCash
tools.description: Take back control by revoking your approvals.
